channel.title: Texture Mods on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Texture Mods on ZooBerry

item.title: Natural Freshwater
item.description: A mod that edits the palette for fresh water tanks and various related graphics to give it a more natural look.

item.title: Texture Mods
item.description: Changes the look of the game, such as new textures for animals, objects, and more.
